deactivateForFund().details: Unimplemented by default, may be overridden.

returns.enabledFees_: An array of enabled fee addresses

getOwner().details: Ownership is deferred to the owner of the FundDeployer contract

params._gav: The GAV for a fund if known in the invocating code, otherwise 0
params._settlementData: The encoded settlement parameters specific to the FeeHook

receiveCallFromComptroller(address,uint2.details: This is the only way to call a function on this contract that updates VaultProxy state. For both of these actions, any caller is allowed, so we don't use the caller param.

params._actionId: An ID representing the desired action

setConfigForFund(bytes).details: The order of `fees` determines the order in which fees of the same FeeHook will be applied. It is recommended to run ManagementFee before PerformanceFee in order to achieve precise PerformanceFee calcs.

activateForFund().notice: Activate already-configured fees for use in the calling fund

deactivateForFund().notice: Allows extension to run logic during fund deactivation

getEnabledFeesForFund(address).notice: Get a list of enabled fees for a given fund

getOwner().notice: Gets the owner of this contract

getVaultProxyForFund(address).notice: Gets the verified VaultProxy for a given ComptrollerProxy

invokeHook(uint8,bytes,uint256).notice: Allows all fees for a particular FeeHook to implement settle() and update() logic

receiveCallFromComptroller(address,uint2.notice: Receives a dispatched `callOnExtension` from a fund's ComptrollerProxy

setConfigForFund(bytes).notice: Enable and configure fees for use in the calling fund
